598620.name: Mystery Riddles
598620.description:
A Doubly Puzzling Magical Adventure!

The most powerful magicians in the kingdom of Mysteria were once the Pictomancers — masters of imbuing painted and woven images with arcane energy. Though they have all but vanished, the Great Tapestries they created long ago have protected the realm… until now.

As the tapestries begin to fray and darkness creeps back into Mysteria, you — the last remaining Pictomancer — must journey across the kingdom to restore these powerful images and save the land from ruin. Travel through a rich magical world and unravel its secrets one puzzle at a time.

Choose your path in one of two puzzle modes: the classic Pic-A-Pix (also known as Picross or nonograms), or the fresh and inventive Fill-A-Pix. Each mode offers a distinct take on logic puzzles and a deeply satisfying sense of discovery as your solutions bring the world of Mysteria back to life.

With 100 handcrafted levels in each mode (200 total) and large grids reaching up to 30×30, Mystery Riddles delivers hours of thoughtful, rewarding gameplay. Explore 10 mysterious locations, enjoy beautiful painted backgrounds, and challenge your logic skills at your own pace.

Mysteria needs you — and its riddles await.

The game is available now. Begin your journey today and restore the Great Tapestries!

Key Features

  • Two distinct puzzle modes: Pic-A-Pix (Picross / nonograms) and Fill-A-Pix

  • 200 handcrafted levels — 100 in each mode

  • Large puzzle grids up to 30×30

  • A rich fantasy world with 10 magical locations to explore

  • Beautifully painted backgrounds

  • Perfect for fans of nonograms, Picross, and relaxing logic puzzles
